app_name: Groups Control Groups Streaming Apps HeTV KDrama Movies TV Shows
app_description: Whether you are an Asian TV show binge watcher or a drama movie enthusiast you ve found your new favorite app. HeTV offers a wide range of Korean Japanese and Chinese dramas allowing you to quickly choose a bingeworthy TV show or a wonderful movie to watch. EXPLORE We have handpicked a range of Asian movies and TV series for you to choose what to watch next. GET TO KNOW MORE A wealth of information on the movie or TV show including seasons and episodes where to watch it reviews videos and much more... LIBRARY Keep an eye on your movies TV shows by assigning them to a list in your library such as: Watched Watching Planning to Watch or Dropped. REMINDER Turn on the reminder for any forthcoming movie that you don t want to miss and you ll be alerted when it s available to watch. NOTIFICATION CENTER All the upcoming movies you are excited to watch can be found in one place after the official release find them in your notification center. CLEAN INTERFACE HeTV app comes with a very simple and elegant interface design as well as integrated gesture features that make its usability even easier. APP ICONS Numerous app icon designs to choose from customize HeTV app icon and make it your preferred style. More features are being developed and will be released in the near future stay tuned. If you have any questions or recommendations please leave them in the reviews area. Consult our Privacy Policy: https: hetv.app privacy
